article.Heading: Budget 2017: Where should government's priorities lies?
article.Summary: In an interview to CNBC-TV18's Latha Venkatesh, Bibek Debroy, Member of NITI Aayog and Subir Gokarn, Executive Director of International Monetary Fund (IMF) shared their readings and outlook the Budget.
article.Body:
In an interview to CNBC-TV18's Latha Venkatesh, Bibek Debroy, Member of NITI Aayog and Subir Gokarn, Executive Director of International Monetary Fund (IMF) shared their readings and outlook the Budget.

Watch accompanying videos for more details.
